tweets.text:
#Kasese:Day 3

Technical teams that inspected areas affected by floods in Kasese are set to present specific findings today to the inter-ministerial team lead by @OPMUganda

At the end of the meeting, an agreed disaster mg't action plan will be signed off.
#GOUworks #ConnectUg https://t.co/7eFDQiQn4h

@DebsCarter1 @KurtRockin @SianieRoo @sajidjavid @pow_rebecca @MPGeorgeEustice @HumanRightsCtte Yes of course it’s harming our children & their developing respiratory systems🤢😭💔. Outrageous that this toxic landfill gas is   Still out of control … where is the duty of care to our babies & children 😡😡😡

@LankesterKaren @SurreyWaste @GuildfordBC @EnvAgencySE @DanHillTV @SurreyCouncil I actually find the lack of scrutiny over prosecutions outside of CPS oversight very concerning. Part of a wider issue certainly but, had this case had oversight, it may well have been decided not to have been in the public interest to spend public money on a prosecution.

@brayparry @SurreyWaste @GuildfordBC @EnvAgencySE @DanHillTV @SurreyCouncil Did nobody look over this case  (scc)spent £1m (approx), & counter party legal fees, then stalemate, then small fine,(means tested), But £1500 bollards whilst “we” stand still & work on this? ( EA “worked with” occupiers for 4 years who carried on dumping😳)

We all make checks before setting off for a day out, whether it’s the weather or the traffic.
 
Make checking water quality part of your routine before heading off and make the most of your trip to a coastal or inland water
 
#WeatherReady #WaterWarriors

home is a torture  chamber cos @ClareDinnisEA didn't do anything yesterday to stop the torture we have today, can't eat, can't sleep, can't go outside, so what the hell is this I live in?a tomb @NULBC what's council tax rate for this @AaronBell4NUL not habitable property

@LankesterKaren @SurreyWaste @GuildfordBC @EnvAgencySE @DanHillTV @SurreyCouncil This is all a bit irrelevant anyway. I tell you what, rather than debating the history of Stoney Castle enforcement action, I'll continue to press for a solution. In the meantime, it you or @SurreyWaste have a viable alternative solution, I'd be willing to listen and support.

@EnvAgencyMids Gaslighted Silverdale at the start then Westlands&other areas by saying the reports were due to knowledge re reporting (ie couldn’t be because we started getting the fumes at that point!)&now it’s spread to Trent Vale,Stoke -guess what? Gaslighted! @MarcLidderthEA https://t.co/FNuck68Q4E
@bettwsresident @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK Farmers get away with it all the time. Cut the subsidies would make them think.

Just submitted an FOI request, mainly to find out if they even attended (which I doubt). 

Cheers for the info on how @Feargal_Sharkey . Not needed to do one before! https://t.co/GKrzyHaY5t
A very useful meeting with the Chief Executive of the @EnvAgency, Sir James Bevan this morning - talking air quality and the #ClimateEmergency. https://t.co/5OHqAYxyYf

@landg_careers @landg_uk @landg_group surely you guys don’t give a fxxx about the environment otherwise you wouldn’t be destroying a working farm in the Vale for money????
But people like @JaneHutt will sell it for you through planning as the @VOGCouncil don’t either care https://t.co/3RvxunRORq

And my house stinks, I had a breakdown myself 2 months ago @EnvAgencyMids told me to see my gp I tried and couldn’t get an appointment @PHE_uk look at our areas statistics against the rest of the uk then tell me we haven’t got a problem 😡😡😡😡 where’s your duty of care?

Nope no monitoring up our end we get ignored and never have questions about distance answered. Surely it’s important to do that because it would back up how absolutely out of control it is. saying that they are perfecting the art of minimising this situation @EnvAgencyMids so https://t.co/TDrUVlQuci
A whole year of knowing the dangers to our children from this monstrous mound of toxic stench https://t.co/Eic1wKGCh3
